title: How much are new lyricists paid in Bollywood? - Quora

response.answer_text: Very less. Got 20k for 4 songs. I wrote 4 songs for a famous singer turned composer Out of which i didnt even get credits for three( it was a tv show and it was meant to be all girls)(imagine a boy writing about woman empowerment). One i got credit for, got 1 mil views. :) PS it wasn’t the singer’s fault, it was the producer - manager thing. If you want to be a lyricist, i will tell you only one thing, the way things look at one glance in bollywood is totally not the reality. Bollywood is shady, partial and full of fox like people trying to eat the artists and let them starve. Music Directors are snatching works and copying tunes, lyricists are being pressurised to write non sense stuff. A lyricist is always a poet first and it hurts to write commercial and shady stuff. Afsurda.
